Edges-Necromancer -- Male Human Legendary Necromancer
Attributes (16 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d10 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Liquid Courage: Drinking alcohol gives +1 Vigor Step and -1 Smarts, Agility and associated skills for 1 hr
Skills (16 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d10 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 22; Edge: 10; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (6 points): Arcane Background (Necromancer); Followers; Liquid Courage; Power Points; Soul Jar; Undead Familiar Hindrances: All Thumbs; Jealous+; Pacifist Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Necromancer): Has Corruption+ and Raise The Dead features
Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Jealous+: Feels envious about others' accomplishments and possessions
Soul Jar: Is undead/2d6 days after being slain, hidden soul inhabits a new corpse
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (d4-2 R3"); Chakram (d6+d4 R4"); Sickle (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Chakram Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Necromancer): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Raise The Dead: May cast Zombie, lasting 4 hr, at novice level
Undead Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card undead animal that stores 5 Power Points
